meanings.definition: Demanding precise accuracy or adherence to rules
meanings.sent1: The exacter measurements were crucial for the experiment's success.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her exacter approach to following instructions.
meanings.sent3: The exacter chef insisted on measuring every ingredient to the exact gram.
meanings.sent4: His exacter nature made him the perfect candidate for the quality control position.
meanings.sent5: The exacter guidelines left no room for error in the assembly process.

meanings.definition: Someone who demands precise accuracy or adherence to rules
meanings.sent1: The exacter always checked every detail before approving the report.
meanings.sent2: As an exacter, she expected nothing less than perfection from her team.
meanings.sent3: The exacter in the group made sure everyone followed the game rules to a tee.
meanings.sent4: He was the exacter who never missed a mistake in the financial records.
meanings.sent5: The exacter's presence ensured that the project met all the strict requirements.
